DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect multiple dose strong P450 enzyme inhibitor itraconazole pharmacokinetics Lu AF35700 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effect Multiple Doses Itraconazole Drug Lu AF35700 Healthy Young Men Women
DOC.criteria: Men , age ≥18 ≤55 year . body weight ≥50 kg woman , age ≥18 ≤45 year , body weight ≥50 kg Good general health assess use detailed medical history , laboratory test , physical examination Known CYP2D6 CYP2C19 genotype Pregnant lactating Subject previously dose Lu AF35700 Other protocol define inclusion exclusion criterion may apply
